placeholder_title: You are not member of any Workspace yet
placeholder_text: Group your projects into workspaces. You decide if they match something as big as an organization or as personal as your pet projects.
tooltip_add_workspace: Group your projects into workspaces. You decide if they match something as big as an organization or as personal as your pet projects.
error_characters: Workspace name can’t contain any of this characters: | ! ? * / .
placehoder_no_access:
You don't have access to any projects in this workspace yet.
Check with your workspace admin.
placehoder_no_projects: There are no projects in the workspace.

delete.deleted_worspace: The workspace {{ name }} has been deleted
delete.modal_title: You cannot delete a workspace that has projects in it
delete.modal_warning:
This workspace has { totalProjects, plural, one {# project} other {# projects} }.
Delete the { totalProjects, plural, one {project} other {projects} } first and try again.

people.members_description: Workspace members can view and manage all projects in this workspace, create new ones and delete them.
people.non_members_description: People that are part of the projects but not workspace members.
people.non_members_empty: There are no project members who are not members of this workspace.

remove.question: Remove {{fullName}} from Workspace?
remove.description: The user will no longer be able to access the workspace but will remain being a member of their projects.
remove.no_longer_member: You are no longer a member of {{workspace}} workspace.

leave.title: Leave {{ workspace }}?
leave.description:
You will lose the permissions granted as a member of the workspace and even lose access to some projects.
This action doesn’t affect your role in the projects you are member of.
leave.warning_title: Workspaces must have at least a member.
leave.warning_descipription: Add another member and try again.
